attributes.action: Charges for pick-up and drop-off parking at airports
attributes.additional_details:
Prompted by the recently introduced drop-off and pick-up charges at Stansted Airport and in light of other airports engaging in the oligopoly practice of imposing unjustified and disproportionate charges on the traveling public, especially families with children and travellers with reduced mobility,  we call on the government to:

"Force the airport operators to operate free of charge pick-up and drop-off zones no further than two minutes walking distance from the main terminal building."
